titlestmt.titleproper: J. H. Causten diary of a European tour, May 1845-March 1846 1845-1846

did.unittitle: J. H. Causten diary of a European tour, May 1845-March 1846
did.repository: University of Pennsylvania, Rare Book and Manuscript Library

bioghist.p: James H. Causten, Jr., (1818-1856) was the son of James H. and Eliza Causten. He was a doctor.

scopecontent.p: This is a travel diary of J. H. Causten. The volume describes Causten's journey to France, where he visited museums, churches, and various other notable sights. Some describe his visits to hospitals and operations he observed. Others describe his accommodations, the journeys from one location to another, and architecture, views, art, and scientific specimens.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
